welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huainan, a city known for its beautiful natural scenery, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Bengbu Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bengbu Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free by selecting it and following the instructions.
